overview: Brought to because you demanded it. Volume #4 from Regiment s Bad Boys series directed by the penultimate director of hottie hunk hardcore, Paul Barressi. In this episode, Brett Dimineo and Brad Rudolph take us to their dirty sex garage and use their tools like skilled craftsmen. Also starring Kelly Walters, Johnny Law, Anthony Holloway, Court Logan, Jean Valjean and Steven Waye. They re young, brazen, rebellious and irresistible!
title: Bad Boys 4
